text: Cuz in nest, ki ʙa coji Alloh taolo sumo faqat ʙuthoe [az sangu cuʙ]-ro meparasted va [ʙo in kor ʙa Alloh taolo] duruƣ meʙanded. Dar haqiqat, kasonero, ki sumo ʙa coji Alloh taolo meparasted, ixtijori ruziatonro nadorand, pas, [ne'matu] ruziro tanho az pesgohi Alloh taolo talaʙ kuned va Uro ʙiparasted va sukri Uro ʙa co ovared [ki] ʙa suji U ʙozgardonda mesaved
